subject: Monthly Budget - January
body:
Hey,

Happy new year! We got tons of donations last month - giving season is always a hit - so we've got a budget of $20,000!! Keep it up!

Best regards,
OctoAid Manager

subject: January 1
body:
Dear OctoAid,

My name is Emma, and I’m reaching out because my wheelchair is falling apart. The frame has cracks, and one of the wheels wobbles constantly, making it unsafe to use. I rely on it daily to get to work and visit my family. A new one would cost $1,500, which I can’t afford on my income. Any help would mean the world to me.

Thank you for considering my request,
Emma Sullivan

subject: January 2
body:
Hi there,

Your FakeMail account is ready to use. Remember, this email client does not send or receive real emails!

Best regards,
FakeMail Team
